comment_body: This is a really cool world! You did a great job establishing the system in such a short time. I would love to see it expanded into a longer story/book. Keep up the good work!

Thank you! I am sort of working it out further in my head right now. I just thought of it while taking my contacts out, I had been remembering that movie Time with Justin Timberlake and this popped into my head.
Ah, I've never heard of that movie. Is it good?
Yes very. The currency is literally time. So you run out you die.
